snippet.title: Age Of Cards - Ra's Chess Story
snippet.description:
The first game in an epic story, Age Of Cards: Ra's Chess is coming soon on the Steam platform. In this video, we talked about the creation of the universe, the war between dark matter and pangu, Pangu giving life to the universe and the formation of gods. 

Ra wanted to be resurrected after his time. He wanted to rule the sun, other energy sources and the Earth. But the rules of Pangun were very simple. A fallen god cannot be resurrected. So the phoenix imprisoned Ra in Limbo.

The planets Gazyon, Delyum, Earth and Matun were at war. The water resources of the planet Matun were exhausted, so it was preparing to invade Earth, the closest planet to itself. All the old and new gods of the world gathered with the call of the phoenix. Earth needed Ra, but Ra also had a plan...

Steam Page: http://kumkuat.net/ytube
